is-live.label: Use live credentials
is-live.helper_text_inactive_store: Only active stores can use live credentials.

is-purchase-order-enabled.label: Allow purchase orders
is-purchase-order-enabled.helper_text_inactive_store: Only active stores can use Purchase Orders as payment option.

payment-methods.delete_message: Are you sure you'd like to remove this payment method? You'll need to configure it again if you decide to bring it back.
payment-methods.label: Payment methods

dialog.undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

list-spinner.loading_error: Unknown error. Failed to load payment methods.

payments-api-payment-method-form.conflict_message: Remove {{ name }} to use this method
payments-api-payment-method-form.no_oauth_support_message: Adding this gateway is currently restricted from this admin. Please utilise our legacy administration to connect this gateway to your payment set.

test-group.label: Test setup
test-group.helper_text_inactive: To use this setup, turn off the "Use live credentials" option in the payment method set.

live-group.label: Live setup
live-group.helper_text_inactive: To use this setup, turn on the "Use live credentials" option in the payment method set.
live-group.inactive_message: Only active stores can accept real payments. To activate your store, please upgrade to a paid plan.

card-verification.label: Card verification
card-verification.helper_text_disabled: Will never verify payment methods. Not recommended.
card-verification.helper_text_enabled_automatically: Will perform a verification on zero-amount transactions when a payment method is required (such as future subscriptions). Greater than zero-amount transactions will be authorized or auth+captured at the full amount.
card-verification.helper_text_enabled_override: For all transactions where a payment method is required (both zero-amount and greater than zero-amount), the payment method will be verified. Payment will not be collected without additional action. Only recommended in specific situations.

use-auth-only.label: Authorize only (no capture)
use-auth-only.helper_text: If your business requires that you do not capture funds immediately, check this box and your order will do an authorization only ("auth-only") and will not capture the funds automatically ("auth-capture"). You will have to capture the funds manually through your gateway's web interface.

score-threshold-reject.label: Rejection threshold
score-threshold-reject.helper_text: A number between 0 and 100. 0 will disable minFraud and 100 will turn it on for logging but still allow all transactions to go through.
score-threshold-reject.v8n_out_of_range: Please enter a whole number between 0 and 100 (inclusive).

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove this fraud protection? You'll need to configure it again if you decide to add it back.
